languages.text: "Будь здесь слуги Тервантьяса, я мог бы показать тебе больше, {name}..." {n}Маражай усмехается, словно только что пошутил, его глаза тлеют углями.{/n} "Например, как можно содрать кожу с мон-кая, не умертвив его. Или превратить эльдара в материал для занятной безделушки, которая будет радовать тебя всю твою жизнь. Но увы. Когда-нибудь в другой раз".

"If Tervantias's servants were here, I could show you more, {name}..." {n}Marazhai chuckles as if he has just made a joke, and his eyes are burning embers.{/n} "For instance, how to skin a mon-keigh without killing it. Or how to turn an Aeldari into material for a charming trinket that will delight you for the rest of your life. But, alas, another time."
languages.original_text: "Будь здесь слуги Тервантьяса, я мог бы показать тебе больше, {name}..." {n}Маражай усмехается, словно только что пошутил, его глаза тлеют углями.{/n} "Например, как можно содрать кожу с мон-кая, не умертвив его. Или превратить эльдара в материал для занятной безделушки, которая будет радовать тебя всю твою жизнь. Но увы. Когда-нибудь в другой раз".

Or how to turn an Aeldari into material for a charming trinket that will delight you for the rest of your life. But, alas, another time."

Or how to turn an Aeldari into material for a charming trinket that will delight you for the rest of your life. But, alas, another time."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “要是特万提亚斯的仆人在这里就好了，我可以让你大开眼界，{name}……”{n}玛拉斋咯咯笑着，仿佛刚刚讲了个笑话一样。他的眼中燃烧着烈焰。{/n}“比如说，我可以让你看看如何剥掉猴子的皮，而又不会弄死他们。或者说，如何把艾达灵族变成用来制作迷人饰品的原材料，让你心悦不已。不过，很遗憾，这些只能下次再说了。”
languages.original_text: "If Tervantias's servants were here, I could show you more, {name}..." {n}Marazhai chuckles as if he has just made a joke, and his eyes are burning embers.{/n} "For instance, how to skin a mon-keigh without killing it. Or how to turn an Aeldari into material for a charming trinket that will delight you for the rest of your life. But, alas, another time."

traits.locale_text: “要是特万提亚斯的仆人在这里就好了，我可以让你大开眼界，{name}……”{n}玛拉斋咯咯笑着，仿佛刚刚讲了个笑话一样。他的眼中燃烧着烈焰。{/n}“比如说，我可以让你看看如何剥掉猴子的皮，而又不会弄死他们。或者说，如何把艾达灵族变成用来制作迷人饰品的原材料，让你心悦不已。不过，很遗憾，这些只能下次再说了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「テルヴァンティアスの従者達がここにいたら、もっと見せられるんだけがな、{name}…」{n}まるで冗談でも言うかのように笑うマラズハイの目は、ゆらゆらと燃えている。{/n}「たとえば、生きたままモン＝ケイの皮を剥く方法とか。あとはアエルダリを材料にして、お前をこれから一生悦ばせる最高のアクセサリーを作る方法とかな。残念だが、またの機会にしよう」
languages.original_text: "If Tervantias's servants were here, I could show you more, {name}..." {n}Marazhai chuckles as if he has just made a joke, and his eyes are burning embers.{/n} "For instance, how to skin a mon-keigh without killing it. Or how to turn an Aeldari into material for a charming trinket that will delight you for the rest of your life. But, alas, another time."

traits.locale_text: 「テルヴァンティアスの従者達がここにいたら、もっと見せられるんだけがな、{name}…」{n}まるで冗談でも言うかのように笑うマラズハイの目は、ゆらゆらと燃えている。{/n}「たとえば、生きたままモン＝ケイの皮を剥く方法とか。あとはアエルダリを材料にして、お前をこれから一生悦ばせる最高のアクセサリーを作る方法とかな。残念だが、またの機会にしよう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Si los sirvientes de Tervantias estuvieran aquí, podría mostrarte más, {name}...». {n}Marazhai ríe entre dientes como si acabase de contar un buen chiste; sus ojos son como brasas candentes.{/n} «Por ejemplo, cómo despellejar a un mon-keigh sin matarlo. O cómo usar partes de un Aeldari para fabricar un bonito abalorio del que puedas disfrutar durante el resto de tus días. En fin, otra vez será».
languages.original_text: "If Tervantias's servants were here, I could show you more, {name}..." {n}Marazhai chuckles as if he has just made a joke, and his eyes are burning embers.{/n} "For instance, how to skin a mon-keigh without killing it. Or how to turn an Aeldari into material for a charming trinket that will delight you for the rest of your life. But, alas, another time."

traits.locale_text: «Si los sirvientes de Tervantias estuvieran aquí, podría mostrarte más, {name}...». {n}Marazhai ríe entre dientes como si acabase de contar un buen chiste; sus ojos son como brasas candentes.{/n} «Por ejemplo, cómo despellejar a un mon-keigh sin matarlo. O cómo usar partes de un Aeldari para fabricar un bonito abalorio del que puedas disfrutar durante el resto de tus días. En fin, otra vez será».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Si les serviteurs de Tervantias étaient ici, je pourrais vous faire une petite démonstration, {name}... » {n}Les yeux pareils à des charbons incandescents, Marazhai se met à rire comme s'il venait de faire une bonne blague.{/n} « Par exemple, je pourrais vous montrer comment on écorche un mon-keigh sans le tuer. Ou comment on transforme un Aeldari en matière première pour créer une amulette ensorcelée propre à vous ravir jusqu'à la fin de vos jours. Hélas, ce sera pour une prochaine fois. »
languages.original_text: "If Tervantias's servants were here, I could show you more, {name}..." {n}Marazhai chuckles as if he has just made a joke, and his eyes are burning embers.{/n} "For instance, how to skin a mon-keigh without killing it. Or how to turn an Aeldari into material for a charming trinket that will delight you for the rest of your life. But, alas, another time."

traits.locale_text: « Si les serviteurs de Tervantias étaient ici, je pourrais vous faire une petite démonstration, {name}... » {n}Les yeux pareils à des charbons incandescents, Marazhai se met à rire comme s'il venait de faire une bonne blague.{/n} « Par exemple, je pourrais vous montrer comment on écorche un mon-keigh sans le tuer. Ou comment on transforme un Aeldari en matière première pour créer une amulette ensorcelée propre à vous ravir jusqu'à la fin de vos jours. Hélas, ce sera pour une prochaine fois. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sollten Tervantias' Diener hier gewesen sein, könnte ich Euch mehr zeigen, {name} ..." {n}Marazhai kichert, als hätte er gerade einen Witz gerissen, und seine Augen glühen dabei.{/n} "Zum Beispiel, wie man einen Chem-Pan-Sey häutet, ohne ihn dabei zu töten. Oder wie man aus einem Aeldari das Material für ein bezauberndes Schmuckstück gewinnt, an dem man sich ein Leben lang erfreuen kann. Aber dann leider ein andermal."
languages.original_text: "If Tervantias's servants were here, I could show you more, {name}..." {n}Marazhai chuckles as if he has just made a joke, and his eyes are burning embers.{/n} "For instance, how to skin a mon-keigh without killing it. Or how to turn an Aeldari into material for a charming trinket that will delight you for the rest of your life. But, alas, another time."

traits.locale_text: "Sollten Tervantias' Diener hier gewesen sein, könnte ich Euch mehr zeigen, {name} ..." {n}Marazhai kichert, als hätte er gerade einen Witz gerissen, und seine Augen glühen dabei.{/n} "Zum Beispiel, wie man einen Chem-Pan-Sey häutet, ohne ihn dabei zu töten. Oder wie man aus einem Aeldari das Material für ein bezauberndes Schmuckstück gewinnt, an dem man sich ein Leben lang erfreuen kann. Aber dann leider ein andermal."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Tervantias'ın hizmetkârları burada olsaydı sana daha fazlasını gösterebilirdim {name}..." {n}Marazhai, sanki espri yapmışçasına kıkırdıyor. Gözleri kor gibi yanıyor.{/n} "Örneğin öldürmeden bir mon-keigh'in nasıl derisini yüzebileceğini ya da bir Aeldari'yi ömrünün sonuna dek sana haz verecek, büyüleyici bir süs eşyası malzemesine nasıl dönüştürebileceğini... Ama ne yazık ki başka sefere kaldı."
languages.original_text: "If Tervantias's servants were here, I could show you more, {name}..." {n}Marazhai chuckles as if he has just made a joke, and his eyes are burning embers.{/n} "For instance, how to skin a mon-keigh without killing it. Or how to turn an Aeldari into material for a charming trinket that will delight you for the rest of your life. But, alas, another time."

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias'ın hizmetkârları burada olsaydı sana daha fazlasını gösterebilirdim {name}..." {n}Marazhai, sanki espri yapmışçasına kıkırdıyor. Gözleri kor gibi yanıyor.{/n} "Örneğin öldürmeden bir mon-keigh'in nasıl derisini yüzebileceğini ya da bir Aeldari'yi ömrünün sonuna dek sana haz verecek, büyüleyici bir süs eşyası malzemesine nasıl dönüştürebileceğini... Ama ne yazık ki başka sefere kaldı."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
